description: Deploy and manage the Azure Managed CCF instances.

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs create
commands.summary: Create an instance of the Azure Managed CCF service.
commands.syntax:
az confidentialledger managedccfs create --members
                                         --name
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--app-type]
                                         [--language-runtime]
                                         [--location]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--node-count]
                                         [--tags]
examples: az confidentialledger managedccfs create --members "[{certificate:'c:/certs/member0_cert.pem',identifier:'member0',group:'group1'},{certificate:'c:/certs/member1_cert.pem',identifier:'member1',group:'group2'}]" --name mymccfinstance --resource-group mccfRG --app-type sample

az confidentialledger managedccfs create --members "[{certificate:'c:/certs/member0_cert.pem',identifier:'member0'},{certificate:'c:/certs/member1_cert.pem',identifier:'member1'}]" --name mymccfinstance --resource-group mccfRG

az confidentialledger managedccfs create --members "[{certificate:'c:/certs/member0_cert.pem',identifier:'member0',group:'mygroup1'},{certificate:'c:/certs/member1_cert.pem',identifier:'member1'}]" --name mymccfinstance --resource-group mccfRG --node-count 5

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs delete
commands.syntax:
az confidentialledger managedccfs delete [--ids]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--yes]

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs list
commands.summary: View the Azure Managed CCF instances in a resource group.

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs show
commands.summary: View the details of an instance.

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs update
commands.syntax:
az confidentialledger managedccfs update [--deployment-type]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--member-certificates]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--node-count]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--tags]

commands.name: az confidentialledger managedccfs wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
